message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
Alice, I'm still interested but $10,500 is a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  This is my final offer.
